extends Object

      • isPointToPoint

        public boolean isPointToPoint()
        Find out if the destination is P2P (a queue) or MOM (a topic).
        Returns:
        true if the destination is a queue; false if the destination is a topic.

        public void tryReconnect(Exception exception)
        This attempts to reconnect to JMS after a JMS failure.
        Parameters:
        exception - The previous exception that occurred connecting to JMS.

      • connect

        public void connect()
        Open the helper and access the destination. Specific function for consumer or producer will be done thereafter by transferring control to the producer or consumer.
